archimate:Requirement.name: R7.1 A basic education on Security Baseline on Cornerstone
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U18 As Security Baseline Owner I need to be able to educate the organization in basic security controls to raise the minimum competency level and understanding in the organization U22 As Security Baseline Owner We want to ensure that stakeholders understand what the baseline does and doesn't do to avoid miscommunication and overcommitment and to promote better understanding U31 As a developer We need help creating education & quiz on Cornerstone so that we can trace the uptake and retention of the education
